commit.message:
Takoyaki Renderer (#1)

* added graphics classes

* cmake tweaks

* fixed 2in1out bug

* added auto_group_sources

* updated filewatcher

* added input definitions

* added widget

* added window classes

* renamed Window to TakoyakiView

* renamed Window to TakoyakiView

* added dependencies

* added precompiled header

* moved overloaded defintion

* removed dubu-serialize

* added serializer

* added takoyaki editor

* renamed amplifier to sensitivity

* moved handlers file

* fixed keyboard support

* don't show demo window from imgui wrapper

* remove camera capture handlers

* remove error popup

* remove const-ref

* fixed warnings

* added clang-format job

* Formatted files using clang-format

* updated uniforms formatting

* Formatted files using clang-format

Co-authored-by: github-actions <41898282+github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
